SEARCH
Package AcademicExchangePlatform.service

Class CourseApplicationService

java.lang.Object
AcademicExchangePlatform.service.CourseApplicationService
public class CourseApplicationService extends Object
Service class for managing course applications. Provides methods for applying for courses, withdrawing applications, updating application status, retrieving applications by course or professional, and checking application eligibility.

    • getInstance

      public static CourseApplicationService getInstance()

    • applyForCourse

      public boolean applyForCourse(CourseApplication application, AcademicProfessional professional)
      Allows an Academic Professional to apply for a course.
      Parameters:
      application - The CourseApplication object containing application details.
      professional - The AcademicProfessional applying for the course.
      Returns:
      true if the application was successful, false otherwise.

    • withdrawApplication

      public boolean withdrawApplication(int applicationId, int professionalId)
      Allows an Academic Professional to withdraw their application.
      Parameters:
      applicationId - The ID of the application to withdraw.
      professionalId - The ID of the Academic Professional withdrawing the application.
      Returns:
      true if the withdrawal was successful, false otherwise.

    • updateApplicationStatus

      public boolean updateApplicationStatus(int applicationId, ApplicationStatus status, int institutionId)
      Updates the status of a course application (e.g., ACCEPTED, REJECTED).
      Parameters:
      applicationId - The ID of the application.
      status - The new status to set.
      institutionId - The ID of the institution processing the application.
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise.

    • getApplicationsByCourse

      public List<CourseApplication> getApplicationsByCourse(int courseId, int institutionId)
      Retrieves all applications for a specific course.
      Parameters:
      courseId - The ID of the course.
      institutionId - The ID of the institution managing the course.
      Returns:
      A list of CourseApplication objects, or null if validation fails.

    • getApplicationsByProfessional

      public List<CourseApplication> getApplicationsByProfessional(int professionalId)
      Retrieves all applications submitted by a specific Academic Professional.
      Parameters:
      professionalId - The ID of the Academic Professional.
      Returns:
      A list of CourseApplication objects.

      Returns:
      The CourseApplication object, or null if not found.
